author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PILAR EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING TO PARTS OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
summary:
...PILAR EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLASH FLOODING TO PARTS OF CENTRAL AMERICA DURING THE NEXT FEW DAYS...
 As of 1:00 PM CDT Mon Oct 30
 the center of Pilar was located near 11.5, -91.2
 with movement ENE at 6 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Pilar (EP4/EP192023)
